amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the maximum number of congressional gold medals that Congress could award from two per calendar year to six per Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-1 to increase the limit of gold medals provided for under the bill from 2 per calendar year to 6 per Congress.
